Name: Bookend
About the game: Harness your imagination to interact with the pop-up book, “The Little Witch” in Bookend, now available on Steam for PC! Explore the book’s world and help the protagonist, the little witch, Abigail, as she’s pursued by an angry mob trying to stop her mission that could either mean saving the world -- or ending it. Guide Abigail along her quest as an external influence in a unique second person perspective. Directly interact with the story and solve puzzles by using pop-up book items such as tabs and trees. Re-imagine your childhood through “The Little Witch” coupled with an enchanting score and whimsical artwork.
